item.title: Samba (SIFS) How To
item.description: Warn: for public internet, use vpn/ssh-tunneling (with samba config-ed for vpn/local nic address) or SSHFS. OBS: CIFS is new protocal, SMB is deprecated after win server 2003. ref See Also Links SFTP: FTP over SSH SSHFS NFS UBUNTU AS SERVER # sudo apt-get install -y samba samba-vfs-modules CONFIG UBUNTU SERVER FOR GUEST/ANANOMOUS (NO PASSWORD) # cp -pf /etc/samba/smb.conf /etc/samba/smb.conf.bak && \ cat /dev/null > /etc/samba/smb.conf && \ vim /etc/samba/smb.conf Paste the foloowing config:
